eventDetails.event: The event name you want to use. | **string**
eventDetails.page_location: The full URL of the current page | **string**
eventDetails.page_path: The path of the current page | **string**
eventDetails.page_title: The title of the current page | **string**
eventDetails.custom_tested: A boolean indicating if the function tested has been tested | **boolean**
eventDetails.custom_user: The unique ID of the user | **number**
